text: @WhiteHouse Pray for over 20 million ppl in Oromiya, Ethiopia who still don't know anything abt COVID-19 b/c the Ethiopian gov @AbiyAhmedAli cut off electricity,phone& Internet services &they're at high risk of dying.Pls tweet the hashtag #ReconnectTheWestETH &save millions of lives @WHOAFRO
